general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Irrigate the maize crop to meet water requirements. Spread polythene in irrigation channels to save water wastage in sandy and loamy soil. Take preventive measures for high temperatures affecting tomato, brinjal, and coconut. Implement proper harvest management practices for onion. Control mango hoppers in mango orchards.

advisory: Yellow stem borer management - spray recommended insecticides.
Blast Disease Management - spray recommended fungicides.
Early Shoot Borer management - frequent irrigation and timely cutting advised.
High temperature increases water requirement - irrigate crops promptly.
Apply Streptocyclin in root zone to prevent wilting.
Install pheromone trap and spray recommended insecticides for management.
Mulch the area around coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover seedlings with paper caps during daytime.
Tobacco Caterpillar Management - dusting and spray recommendations.
Tobacco Caterpillar Management - dusting and spray recommendations.
Harvest and store onions properly for longer shelf life.
Mango hopper control - spray recommended insecticides.
